extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Data Structures in computer programs and Jarvis in Iron Man have efficient storage and access as a design principle.

data_structures.mechanism: Ensuring data is stored and accessed in a way that minimizes resource usage and maximizes retrieval speed.

extended_metaphor.jarvis: Jarvis, similar to efficient data structures, processes and stores information efficiently, allowing Tony Stark quick access to data to make informed decisions swiftly.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Data Structures in computer programs and Jarvis in Iron Man have systematic organization as a design principle.

data_structures.mechanism: Designing the layout of components in a structured and orderly manner to optimize data storage, retrieval, and manipulation processes.

extended_metaphor.jarvis: Jarvis, like well-organized data structures, categorizes and organizes information logically, enabling easy retrieval and seamless functionality for Tony Stark in managing tasks effectively.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Data Structures in computer programs and Jarvis in Iron Man have optimization of functionality as a design principle.

data_structures.mechanism: Arranging components to enhance the functionality of the system, ensuring smooth movement and usability akin to a well-planned building layout.

extended_metaphor.jarvis: Jarvis, similar to optimized data structures, maximizes its capabilities to aid Tony Stark in various tasks, providing efficient and seamless support akin to a well-coordinated system.
